Question
========

Select the characteristics of STL.

Answerlist
----------

* Seasonal component should not change over time 
* Errors should be uniformely distributed
* STL does not have an underlying model
*	STL can provide the confidence interval for the seasonal component
* STL can only provide the confidence interval for the predicted values

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

*	False. No assumptions for DGP are required
* False. No assumptions for DGP are required		
* True. 
* False. STL is not a model
* False. STL is not a model
